description: The first phase of Leeds Bradford Airport's expansion project is set to be completed by summer.
title: First look inside Leeds Bradford Airport's £100m expansion
title_page: First look inside Leeds Bradford Airport's £100m expansion - BBC News
maintext:
The first phase of Leeds Bradford Airport's £100m expansion project is set to be completed by summer.
The new terminal extension will provide an 83% increase in seating capacity, with phase two of the development seeing a refurbishment of the existing building.
Vincent Hodder, airport chief executive officer, previously said it was "the first major improvement to our terminal since its opening in 1968 and is long overdue".
